title: Naruto
incorrectStatement: In *Naruto*, the Sharingan allows its user to control time.
correction: Actually, the Sharingan allows the user to copy techniques and predict movement, not control time.

title: Sailor Moon
incorrectStatement: Each of the Sailor Soldiers is named after a planet in our solar system.
correction: Not all are named after planets. The moon isn’t a planet, and Pluto isn’t one anymore.
comment: Do you think Sailor Pluto got demoted?
